title: Drew Brees breaks Peyton Manning's all-time pass TD record, Saints-Colts MNF Recap (Football 12/17)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to recap the Saints 34-7 victory over the Colts on Monday Night Football (2:45). The guys focus on Drew Brees' record-setting night (5:05), as he surpassed Peyton Manning for the most touchdown passes in NFL history, examining his legacy and much more. The Pick Six Superfriends also discuss Indy's downfall and their future at QB (22:20) before checking in on the NFC playoff picture (28:20). Next, some news items (35:45) including Janoris Jenkins being claimed by New Orleans, Terrell Suggs being claimed by Kansas City, another suspension for Josh Gordon and what the Steelers should do at quarterback in Week 16. Then, CBS Sports Senior NFL Reporter Jonathan Jones joins the podcast (51:00) to recap Bills-Steelers from Sunday night and the weird vibe from Heinz Field while also detailing the ceilings' of each team, the tremendous coaching efforts this season from Sean McDermott and Mike Tomlin, the Defensive Player of the Year race and more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
